title: Fan, 19th century
medium:
Medium: imitation blonde tortoise
Technique: duchesse lace (needle and bobbin laces)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson
description: Single leaf of lace with painted central scene of cherubs. Sticks of imitation amber-colored tortoise with ribbon holder.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 19th century.Medium: imitation blonde tortoise
Technique: duchesse lace (needle and bobbin laces). Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson. 1970-58-10.
